channel.title: dewiweb – Projects & Contributions
channel.description: Recent content in Projects & Contributions on dewiweb

item.title: emberplus_rust
item.description:
Overview

A Rust implementation of the Ember+ protocol, covering both the client (consumer) and server (provider) roles.

Ember+ is a control protocol used in the broadcast and audiovisual industry for communication between equipment (mixers, routers, monitoring systems…).

Features

  • Ember+ client (consumer) implementation
  • Ember+ server (provider) implementation
  • Written in Rust (performance, memory safety)

Why Rust?

Rust provides excellent memory-safety guarantees and performance for a low-level protocol like Ember+, which requires reliable, low-latency communication.

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: Rust

item.title: holophonix-animator
item.description:
Overview

Desktop application for creating and managing movement animations for spatial audio tracks on the Holophonix processor.

It communicates with Holophonix via the OSC protocol and lets you define trajectories and dynamic behaviours for sound sources in 3D space.

Features

  • Create movement behaviours (circles, lines, free trajectories)
  • Manage multiple tracks simultaneously
  • OSC synchronisation with Holophonix
  • Desktop GUI (Electron/Node.js)

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript/TypeScript

item.title: rpi-media-kiosk
item.description:
Overview

A plug-and-play solution to turn any Raspberry Pi into a full-screen media kiosk player. Automatically plays videos, PowerPoint presentations, PDFs and image slideshows from a USB stick or local storage — all rendered via Chromium.

Ideal for installations, exhibitions, digital signage or any stage use case requiring automatic media playback.

Features

  • Autoplay on boot
  • Supports: video, PDF, PowerPoint (converted), image slideshows
  • Load from USB stick or local storage
  • Chromium in kiosk mode (full-screen, no UI)
  • Simple configuration

Requirements

  • Raspberry Pi (any recent generation)
  • Raspberry Pi OS
  • Chromium (included by default on Raspberry Pi OS)

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: HTML/Shell

item.title: Spatial audio & spatialisation
item.description:
trajectoires

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/trajectoires

Mobile/web application for spatial audio control via OSC. Fork of the original, adapted and used as a working base.

  • Language: Objective-C
  • Usage: OSC control of sound sources from mobile

SPARTA

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/SPARTA

Collection of VST audio plugins for spatial audio production, reproduction and visualisation. Suite developed by Aalto University.

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: GPL-3.0
  • Original project

VISR-Production-Suite

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/VISR-Production-Suite

Suite of audio plugins for spatial production, from the S3A research project.

  • Language: C++
  • Official site

item.title: Control protocols
item.description:
ember-plus

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ember-plus

The official Ember+ protocol from Lawo — an open control protocol for the broadcast and audiovisual industry. Used to communicate between broadcast equipment (mixers, routers, monitoring systems).

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: BSL-1.0
  • Original project

ember-plus-sharp

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ember-plus-sharp

Ember+ implementation for .NET, enabling the rapid creation of fully-typed Ember+ consumers in any .NET language.

  • Language: C#
  • Licence: BSL-1.0
  • Documentation

OSCRouter

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/OSCRouter

Simple UDP/TCP packet router for Mac and Windows with OSC-specific options. Redistributes OSC messages between multiple applications or devices.

  • Language: C++
  • Licence: MIT

item.title: music-constellation
item.description:
Overview

A web application that represents a beets music library as an interactive constellation. Each star is an album or artist, and the links between them illustrate relationships (genres, years, similarities).

A poetic, visual way to explore your music collection.

Features

  • Connect to a beets library (via the beets web API)
  • SVG/Canvas constellation graph representation
  • Interactive navigation (zoom, pan, select)
  • Filter by genre, decade, artist

Stack

  • TypeScript
  • Visualisation: D3.js or Canvas
  • Backend: beets API

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: spacemouse-osc
item.description:
Overview

Bridge between the 3Dconnexion SpaceMouse Compact and the OSC (Open Sound Control) protocol. Lets you use the 6DoF (6 degrees of freedom) controller to drive sound sources in 3D space in real time.

Particularly well suited to controlling spatialisation systems such as Holophonix, Max/MSP or SuperCollider.

Features

  • Read 6DoF data (X/Y/Z translation + rotation) from the SpaceMouse
  • Convert and send data as OSC messages
  • Configurable mappings (axes, OSC addresses, value ranges)
  • Low latency for real-time control

Status

⭐ 14 stars · 1 fork · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript
  • Licence: MIT
  • Topics: 3dconnexion 6dof osc spacemouse spatial-audio

item.title: XCTL_
item.description:
Overview

Reference documentation for the XCTL protocol used by Behringer X-Touch mixing consoles (and compatible surfaces). This MIDI-extended protocol enables bidirectional communication between the control surface and a DAW or custom control system.

This repository collects information gathered through reverse engineering and community documentation — officially undocumented by Behringer.

Contents

  • XCTL message structure
  • Control mapping (faders, encoders, buttons, LEDs, displays)
  • JavaScript implementation examples
  • Comparison with HUI and Mackie Control protocols

Status

⭐ 2 stars · Active · GitHub Pages available

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Online documentation
  • Language: JavaScript
  • Licence: GPL-3.0

item.title: ALSA-RAVENNA-AES67-Driver
item.description:
Overview

Clone of the ALSA RAVENNA/AES67 driver originally provided by Merging Technologies. This Linux kernel module (LKM) enables the RAVENNA network audio transport protocol (compatible with AES67) within the ALSA subsystem on Linux.

RAVENNA/AES67 is a professional audio-over-IP transport standard used in studios, concert halls and broadcast installations.

Features

  • Linux kernel module (Loadable Kernel Module)
  • RAVENNA/AES67 audio transport over IP
  • Native ALSA integration
  • Compatible with Merging Technologies equipment and other AES67 devices

Status

⭐ 53 stars · 10 forks

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Original source (Merging Technologies)
  • Language: C
  • Topics: aes67 alsa driver linux

item.title: Bitfocus Companion modules
item.description:
Overview

Bitfocus Companion turns an Elgato Stream Deck into a professional control surface for broadcast and stage equipment. These modules integrate specific devices.

companion-module-canon-network-legacy-http

Repository · github.com/dewiweb/companion-module-canon-network-legacy-http

Companion module for controlling Canon cameras via the legacy HTTP network API. Allows driving compatible Canon cameras from a Stream Deck.

  • Language: JavaScript · Protocol: HTTP

companion-module-powersoft-amplifier

Repository · github.com/dewiweb/companion-module-powersoft-amplifier

Companion module for controlling Powersoft amplifiers. Monitor and control Powersoft amps (X series, Quattrocanali, etc.) from a Stream Deck.

  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: MCxOSC
item.description:
Overview

A bridge between the Ember+ and OSC protocols, specifically designed for Lawo MCx consoles. Allows controlling and monitoring an MCx console from any OSC environment (Chataigne, Max/MSP, QLab, etc.).

Features

  • Bidirectional Ember+ ↔ OSC translation
  • Adapted to Lawo MCx console specifics
  • Interfacing with show control systems via OSC

Status

⭐ 6 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript

item.title: Tools & Sequencers
item.description:
IanniX

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/IanniX

IanniX is an open source graphical sequencer inspired by Iannis Xenakis, designed for digital art. It synchronises events and curves via OSC to real-time environments (Max/MSP, Pure Data, SuperCollider…).

  • Language: C++ (Qt)
  • Licence: GPL-3.0
  • Official site

scenic

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/scenic

Telepresence application for live performances and artistic installations. Allows sharing of video, audio and data streams between remote sites.

  • Language: Python
  • Licence: GPL-3.0
  • Documentation

item.title: AES67 & network audio
item.description:
aes67-web-monitor

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/aes67-web-monitor

Tool to monitor AES67 streams via a web page: VU meter, RTP and timing statistics, PCM sound in the browser.

  • ⭐ 1 star

aes67-linux-daemon

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/aes67-linux-daemon

Linux daemon for AES67 audio transport with a WebUI for configuration.

  • Language: C++

aes67-recorder

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/aes67-recorder

Linux/GStreamer-based AES67 multitrack audio backup solution.

  • Language: Python

mai

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/mai

Mark’s AES67 Implementation — a C implementation of the AES67 standard.

  • ⭐ 1 star · Language: C

MARIAN-ALSA-DRIVER

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/MARIAN-ALSA-DRIVER

ALSA driver for MARIAN audio interfaces.

item.title: holophonix_blender_addon
item.description:
Overview

A Blender addon providing utility functions for Holophonix projects, including management of tracks, speakers, handlers and OSC operations directly from Blender’s interface.

Combines Blender’s 3D visualisation power with the Holophonix spatialisation engine.

Features

  • Manage Holophonix tracks from Blender
  • Configure speakers (positions, groups)
  • Manage OSC handlers
  • Direct OSC operations to Holophonix
  • 3D visualisation of the sound scene in Blender

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: Python

item.title: MCxOSCnext
item.description:
Overview

A rewrite and evolution of MCxOSC — an Ember+ to OSC bridge. Revised architecture for greater robustness and flexibility, compatible with a wider range of Ember+ equipment.

Features

  • Ember+ ↔ OSC bridge with improved architecture
  • Better error handling and automatic reconnection
  • Compatible with any Ember+ device, not only Lawo MCx

Status

⭐ 4 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript

item.title: trajectoires-modern
item.description:
Overview

Full rewrite of the Trajectoires application, a web/mobile interface for controlling sound spatialisation via OSC. This modernised version is developed in TypeScript with a revised architecture.

Trajectoires lets you draw and animate trajectories for sound sources in space, then send them in real time to a spatialisation system.

Features

  • GUI for defining movement trajectories
  • Real-time OSC output
  • Modern TypeScript architecture
  • Compatible with OSC systems (Holophonix, Max/MSP, etc.)

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: TypeScript

item.title: chataigne_spatiale
item.description:
Overview

A Python module integrating the Holophonix spatial audio processor into Chataigne — a modular software for arts and technology. Drives spatial sound sources from Chataigne’s interface via OSC.

Features

  • Control Holophonix sources from Chataigne
  • Bidirectional OSC communication
  • Integration into show control workflows

Status

⭐ 7 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: Python

item.title: Show control & OSC
item.description:
open-stage-control

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/open-stage-control

Libre and modular OSC/MIDI controller. Customisable web interface to drive any system via OSC or MIDI.

  • Language: JavaScript

ADM-OSC

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ADM-OSC

OSC dictionary implementing the Audio Definition Model (ADM) — standard for object-based and immersive audio.

sisyfos-audio-controller

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/sisyfos-audio-controller

Intelligent audio controller for automation systems (broadcast). Manages routing and mixing via a web interface.

  • Language: TypeScript

Chataigne

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/Chataigne

Artist-friendly modular machine for art and technology by Benjamin Kuperberg. Central show control tool used with several of my modules.

  • Language: C++

companion

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/companion

Bitfocus Companion — turns an Elgato Stream Deck into a professional control surface for broadcast and stage equipment.

  • Language: JavaScript

companion-module-denon-recorder

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/companion-module-denon-recorder

Companion module for Denon recorders.

  • Language: JavaScript

Behringer-x-Touch-Extender-Chataigne-Module

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/Behringer-x-Touch-Extender-Chataigne-Module

Chataigne module for the Behringer X-Touch Extender controller.

  • Language: JavaScript

XTouch-Universal-Chataigne-Module

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/XTouch-Universal-Chataigne-Module

Universal Chataigne module for Behringer X-Touch surfaces.

midimonster

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/midimonster

Multi-protocol control & translation software: ArtNet, MIDI, OSC, sACN and more.

item.title: Broadcast & media
item.description:
sofie-emberplus-connection

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/sofie-emberplus-connection

Ember+ connection layer for Sofie — the modern TV news studio automation system. TypeScript Ember+ communication layer.

  • Language: TypeScript

pi-list

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pi-list

Live IP Software Toolkit from the EBU to assist in implementing IP facilities (ST2110, AES67). Analysis and monitoring tool for IP media streams.

  • Language: C++

media-network-manager-cloud

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/media-network-manager-cloud

MnMs — set of tools for monitoring and administering real-time media networks (ST2110, AES67, Dante…).

ear-production-suite

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/ear-production-suite

VST plugin suite for producing and reproducing immersive and personalisable audio, based on the Audio Definition Model (ADM) and ITU renderer.

  • ⭐ 1 star

pam

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/pam

Audio Monitoring Software designed to run on a Raspberry Pi with touchscreen.

  • ⭐ 1 star · Language: C++

BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Fork · github.com/dewiweb/BM-Camera-Control-WebUI

Extensible web interface for Blackmagic camera control.

  • Language: JavaScript

item.title: Holophonix-chataigne-module
item.description:
Overview

A Chataigne module dedicated to the Holophonix spatial audio processor. Natively integrates Holophonix into Chataigne to drive sound sources, read states and automate behaviours in a show control context.

Features

  • Control Holophonix spatial audio sources from Chataigne
  • Read/write parameters via OSC
  • Integration into complex show control workflows
  • Compatible with recent Holophonix versions

Status

⭐ 6 stars · active

Links

  • GitHub repository
  • Language: JavaScript
